.@WKDZ reports: @LeaderMcConnell praised the decision, and noted Judge White is the first Kentuckian nominated for the TVA Board under this Administration. As such, McConnell said he believes White will bring a “unique” Bluegrass perspective to the job. https://t.co/in2t46lYHB
